name: todo-app
description: A simple, intuitive, and responsive To-Do List web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app allows users to add tasks to a list, providing a clear view of what needs to be done. Useres can also delte tasks once they are completed, promoting a sense of productivity and achievement. This project serves as an introduction to web development, the application of the CI/CD pipeline to the application, and the overall process of deploying an application.
